import React from "react"; import { useHistory, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import { LockClosedIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import useForm from "../store/user" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { setLogin } from "../store/user" const Login = () => { const history = useHistory(); const email = useForm(); const password = useForm(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("/api/auth/login", { email: email.value, password: password.value, }) .then((response) => response.data) .then((data) => { console.log("data axios", data) dispatch(setLogin(data)) history.push("/home") }) .catch(() => alert("Credencial no autenticada")) }; return (
